faq.title: What You Might Be Wondering About the Design for Good Initiative
faq.description: We know this model is new — so here are a few quick answers. If you have more, we'd love to chat.

questions.question: How does the 40% discount work?
questions.answer: Founding members get 40% off their first year of membership, then 20% off for life. This means you pay £1,499/month in year one, then £1,999/month thereafter — compared to our standard £2,499/month rate.

questions.question: What types of design work do you handle?
questions.answer: Everything your nonprofit needs: fundraising materials, social media graphics, newsletters, annual reports, event materials, website graphics, print materials, and more. If it's design-related, we can help.

questions.question: How fast do you deliver designs?
questions.answer: Most requests are completed within 72 hours. Complex projects may take longer, but we'll always communicate timelines upfront and keep you updated throughout the process.

questions.question: Is there a limit to design requests?
questions.answer: No limits! Submit as many requests as you need. We work on them one at a time to ensure quality, and you can have multiple requests in your queue.

faq.contactCta: Still have questions? Reach out here
